WorkItem.Description:
Need a good example written in c# on how to deal with complex data types on the client end of an ASP.NET application. Creating the wcf data service exposing the EF model and importing a stored procedure as a function is not that dificult to do. However, consuming a stored proc always returns nothing.
 
I have read that this is because there is no entity attached to the proc and therefore the data is not transformed(deserialized) correctly, causing an exception.
 
I hope that this one is not a big one to get some sample code.
Thanks in advance,
Al Longobardi
WorkItem.Summary: wcf data services using entity framework with stored procedures utilizing complex data types.
